metadata.title: CVE-2023-30774 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in the libtiff library. This flaw causes a heapbuffer overflow issue via the TIFFTAG_INKNAMES and TIFFTAG_NUMBEROFINKSvalues.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-30774` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8').
